title: Exposing This Scandalous Biden Coverup (Ep 1723)
description:
The Biden administration is hiding something about this growing scandal in Ukraine. In this episode I address the evidence that they’re colluding to censor damaging information. 

News Picks:

Republican congressman wants answers about the January 6th “bomber.”


Breaking news about that infamous “hack” of the DNC. 

Of course inflation is Biden’s fault.


New information about the Ukrainian bio lab.

The despotic Surgeon General is calling for censorship, again.

Major study shows masks don’t work.


The CDC gives up the gig on masks. Are they coming back?
